name: 5 Minutes Till Dawn
description:
A game made for VimJam 3.

You play as a little baby fire born from his mother camfire and has to keep himself and his mother alive by collecting materials to feed you and your mom, but also crafting tools and defences from the monsters of the night. To let that fire burn out!

Controls;

WASD/Arrow keys: To move.

Space: To Collect/Interact.

L-Click: On top of material to feed baby/mom. 

Programming:Litefeather

Art: Me
